mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( category, title, content, writer ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT bno, category, title, content, writer, secret, regdate, upddate, viewcnt, likecnt FROM t_board WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT bno, category, title, content, writer, secret, regdate, upddate, viewcnt, likecnt FROM t_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno DESC, regdate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET likecnt = likecnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT bno, category, title, content, writer, secret, regdate, upddate, viewcnt, likecnt FROM t_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno DESC, regdate DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10
SELECT bno, category, title, content, writer, secret, regdate, upddate, viewcnt, likecnt FROM t_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno DESC, regdate DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_board WHERE bno > 0
